attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our idea is simple and would reduce the carbon footprint from the U.K
We would look to Parliament to legislate that the big stores that open on Sundays should close. Immediately, there would be saving in energy, plus less pollution from vehicles.




Visit our website www.freewebs.com/howgreenisyoursunday/
